contract_details.description: Clean and optimize SOLID compliance systems while preserving functionality. Focus on improving test coverage, eliminating technical debt, and ensuring clean architectural patterns.
contract_details.background: Agent-6 specializes in SOLID principles and architectural quality. This contract leverages that expertise to systematically clean up compliance systems while maintaining high standards.
objectives: Audit all SOLID compliance violations and architectural issues
Refactor code to improve SOLID compliance without breaking functionality
Increase test coverage for compliance-critical modules to >90%
Eliminate technical debt in SOLID-related systems
Create automated compliance checking and reporting
Validate architectural changes don't introduce regressions
deliverables: Refactored code with improved SOLID compliance (>95% score)
Test coverage increased to >90% for critical modules
Technical debt reduction report with specific improvements
Architectural validation report confirming no regressions
technical_requirements: SOLID principle analysis and refactoring tools
Test coverage measurement and improvement tools
success_criteria: SOLID compliance score >95% across all modules

contract_history.details: Created cleanup-focused contract for Agent-6 SOLID compliance and testing
